requests.description: Retrieve the fact table for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).
requests.name: listFactTable

requests.description: Retrieve information about all or a selection of entities
requests.name: listEntities

responseCode.name: OK
responseCode.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.

headers.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
headers.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

headers.name: Connection
headers.description: Options that are desired for the connection

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The mime type of this content

headers.name: Date
headers.description: The date and time that the message was sent

headers.name: Server
headers.description: A name for the server

headers.name: transfer-encoding
headers.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

responses.name: Get list of all companies/IDs

requests.description: Retrieve the filings of a particular entity
requests.name: listFilings

requests.description: Retrieve a summary for all components of a given filing
requests.name: listComponents

requests.description: Retrieve the business-friendly spreadsheet for a report. Filters can be overriden. Filters MUST be overriden if the report is not already filtering.
requests.name: listSpreadsheetForReport

requests.description: Retrieve one or more facts for a combination of filings.
requests.name: listFacts

requests.description: [SEC profile] Retrieve the model structure for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).
requests.name: listModelStructure

requests.description: Retrieve the business friendly Spreadsheet for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).
requests.name: spreadsheetForComponent

requests.description: Retrieve the report elements contained in a set of filings.
requests.name: listReportElements
